attribute.description: The rendered indicator for this component.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Map basemap layer. Valid values are "streets", "streets-vector", "streets-navigation-vector", "streets-night-vector", "streets-relief-vector", "satellite", "hybrid", "topo", "topo-vector", "oceans", "gray", "gray-vector", "dark-gray", "dark-gray-vector", "terrain", "national-geographic", and "osm". See the com.gisfaces.model.map.Basemap enum class.
attribute.name: basemap

attribute.description: Map zoom level. Most ESRI background layers range from 0 to 16 or 23. Defaults to "3".
attribute.name: zoom

attribute.description: Map widgets color theme. Valid values are "light", "dark", "light-blue", "dark-blue", "light-green", "dark-green", "light-purple", "dark-purple", "light-red", "dark-red". Defaults to "light".
attribute.name: theme

attribute.description: Map view type. Valid values are "2d" and "3d". Defaults to "3d".
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: ESRI JavaScript API URL override. Defaults to "https://js.arcgis.com/4.11". Do not include the trailing slash.
attribute.name: jsapi

attribute.description: The rendered indicator for this component.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Map layer number as defined in the map service.
attribute.name: layer

attribute.description: Map layer label for the requested symbol as defined by the map service attribute table alias name. Not required if the layer only has a single symbol.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Map symbol height in pixels. Defaults to the symbol height specified in the map service.
attribute.name: height

attribute.description: Map symbol width in pixels. Defaults to the symbol width specified in the map service.
attribute.name: width

attribute.description: Map symbol title text. Defaults to the symbol label specified in the map service.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: Map symbol alternate text. Defaults to the symbol label specified in the map service.
attribute.name: alt

attribute.description: The rendered indicator for this component.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: SVG fill opacity. Valid values range from 0.0 to 1.0, inclusive. Defaults to "1.0".
attribute.name: fillOpacity

attribute.description: SVG stroke opacity. Valid values range from 0.0 to 1.0, inclusive. Defaults to "1.0".
attribute.name: strokeOpacity

attribute.description: SVG error message if not supported by the browser. Defaults to "SVG not supported.".
attribute.name: message
